titleStmt.title: The Kings possessions: written by His Majesties own hand; annexed by way of notes, to a letter sent to the Ecclesiasticall Assembly at London: in answer to a letter sent from them.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Stephen Bulkley, printer to the Kings Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 21 1646"; the 7 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
